name: safe_night_ops_checklist
goal: Stay safe when operating at night while building or gathering

steps.title: Check Time and Threats
steps.details: If time_of_day is sunset/night, scan nearby hostiles and terrain hazards before committing to long tasks.
checks: No nearby hostile mobs within immediate range

steps.title: Secure Temporary Cover
steps.details: Place a quick 3-block high wall or enter shelter before continuing collection or crafting.

steps.title: Maintain Lighting
steps.details: Place torches around the active work zone to reduce hostile spawn pressure.

notes: Use this checklist as a safety preflight when a task spans into nighttime.
